name: ATAGZone
0:
”Alexa, what is the temperature of the water heater?”
”Alexa, set the dining room to 20 degrees.”
”Alexa, what is the temperature setting for the studio?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
ATAG Zone is the skill that makes your product smart thanks to remote temperature management, consumption optimisation and constant monitoring of the product's operating status.
Now you can enhance your experience with voice control to manage your product and create a smart home with the Amazon Alexa app.
To get started, select "Enable to use," connect your ATAG Zone account* and start searching for your water heater. After connecting Alexa to your ATAG product, try giving some commands** such as: "Alexa, set the dining room to 20 degrees"; "Alexa, what is the temperature setting for the study?"; "Alexa, raise the temperature of the water heater"; "Alexa, what is the temperature of the water heater?"
*To connect Alexa to ATAG Zone, you must use the ATAG Zone account, which is the account you created and used to control your ATAG connected product.
**When using this Skill, you must specify the name of the thermostat or water heater. The thermostat name is the same you gave to the zone where the thermostat is installed. It can be configured in the ATAG Zone app or directly within the Alexa app.
